players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I saw Charlie last night and he seemed fine. I have no idea what happened to him."
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found out she is the mafioso. Bob remained silent last night, which could be suspicious."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Bob and Diana should be careful as I might target them next."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
